body.name: MAGICRAVEN 4K Portable Monitor, 13.3" UHD IPS Laptop Monitor, Slim Lightweight Dual USB C HDMI Computer Monitor Gaming Display with Speakers, Travel Monitor for PC Phone PS5/4 Xbox Switch(No Cover)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 1 min
features: 【13.3" 4K Portable Monitor】: MagicRaven portable monitor equips spectacular IPS A-grade screen with 13.3 inch, 3840x2160 resolution, 400 nits brightness, 1500:1 contrast ratio, 100% sRGB, 178 degree wide viewing angle and 60 hz refresh rate. This travel monitor has HDR, Low Blue Light and FreeSync features. External Screen will show crisp color, vivid image and clear detail.

【Ultra Lightweight On The Go】: This portable laptop monitor is only 0.97 lb weight(Monitor Only) and 0.19" (Min) and 0.35" (Max) thickness. The portable display is easy to slides into your bag. Whether you're at home, traveling, in the office, coffee shop, hotel, airport, courtyard, or anywhere else, you can work or play with ease.

【VESA Mountable & Sturdy Kickstand】: This portable screen can stand with small but sturdy kickstand or vesa stand (not included) as your choice. The standard 75x75mm VESA holes on the back allows you to mount the monitor to a desktop or wall and set it to landscape or portrait mode as needed.

【Increase your Productivity】: After connecting our dual monitor to your device with cable, the portable screen will work immediately without any driver installation. Increase your productivity and improve your gaming experience, a great choice for second or multiple screen.

【Dual USB-C Port】: Our dual monitor is plug-and-play, so you can start using it right away without any driver installation. This laptop extend monitor provides 2 Full Feature USB-C ports and a Mini-HDMI port, allowing you to connect to most laptops, Macs, PCs, PS5/4, XBOX, Nintendo Switch, and more with only one USB-C cable (devices with full features USB-C port) or HDMI cable and power supply.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MagicRaven 13.3" 4K UHD IPS Portable Monitor With 13.3 inch, 3840*2400 resolution, 1500:1 contrast ratio, 400 nits brightness, 1.07b colors, 100% sRGB, 178 degree wide viewing angle and 60 hz refresh rate screen, MagicRaven monitor will show crisp color, vivid image and clear detail.

One USB-C Cable, Plug and Play This extend monitor provides 2 Full Feature USB-C ports and and a HDMI port. You can connect our computer display to your devices with only one USB-C Cable (Need devices with full-featured USB-C port) or HDMI cable and power supply.

Share The Screen with Your Partner With this mini portable monitor, you and your partner can communicate more conveniently to achieve an agreement. Increase your productivity and improve your working experience, a great choice for second or multiple screen.
Travel Ready Only 0.97 lb (Monitor Only) weight and 0.19"(Min) and 0.35" (Max) thickness, easy to carry it everywhere and increase your productivity.

How to connect monitor MagicRaven monitor can be used with your laptop with full-featured USB-C port through only one USB C to USB C cable You can also connect it through HDMI to HDMI cable and USB C to USB A cable to get power and if it doesn't work, please connect the portable monitor to power supply(20w or above) through USB A to USB C cable first.

Enjoy High-Definition Entertainment This portable monitor equips spectacular IPS A-grade screen with 16 in" and 2520x1680 resolution, you can enjoy high-Definition entertainment and gaming experience.

Vesa Mountable Portable Monitor This portable screen can stand with kickstand or vesa stand (not included) as your choice.The standard 75x75mm VESA holes on the back allows you to mount the monitor to a desktop or wall and set it to landscape or portrait mode as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great monitor! Such a bang for your buck, crisp screen, so light and easy to carry, comes with all cables needed, built in stand and Vesa mountable. I could not have ask for more but I did get more: the customer service was amazing as well. Thank you Magicraven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Screen does not function properly after a few months.
reviews.reviewText: When I first purchased the screen it worked well and the startup was fast. I used it to connect to my MacBook and black magic atemi mini for live streaming video productions.It no longer recognizes the my micro hdmi connection anymore.Edit Update:After my initial review, I recieved a response from MagicRaven's customer service team and they gave me options to resolve my issues. Although my experience may be not as I had hoped for their product, the make it up with their customer service.Maybe in the future as they continue to grow their product line, i will re-consider making a purchase from their brand. I'm routing for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is light weight and has a great picture!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is not 4K screen monitor
reviews.reviewText: This is not 4k screen monitor. Absolutely! Supports up to 1920x1080 maximum. Using Dell laptop with 4k screen, connected to it and no resolution on the purchased monitor more than 1920x1080. Probably will return

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this size and have 4K!
reviews.reviewText: This is great screen. Powered by USB-C come with ac adapter.but if you have portable battery, you can use it too.mini HDMI so you have to have the regular HDMI to mini HDMI cable which is come with.screen has own stand and soft case also to be stand.I love this screen and I told my friend and who bought 2 already!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for multi-tasking
reviews.reviewText: I like monitors! On my work desktop I have 2x 32" 4k monitors hooked up side by side on my standing desk. However, even with that much real-estate I decided that I need to get this monitor for some ancillary items.I use Microsoft PowerToys' "Fancy Zones" to chop up my monitors into little sections that I can snap windows into. So I opted to add this so that I could have my Beeper app (iMessage, WhatsApp, Goolge Messages, etc) take up half the screen. Then on 1/4 of it I put my BitWarden password manager for quick access and my Walking tracker (Excel version) to keep track of my steps taken that day on my under-desk treadmill.This has been an amazing add on to my desk & I use it every day! It also serves as an overflow should I need more space--especially during Zoom meetings to throw the shared screen presentation down there & keep the people on the main screen.PROS:- 4k with a USB connection - I was skeptical whether the USB C monitor would get power & 4k without any additional cords. Plug --> Play truly described it. 100% zoom with 4k and it is a beautiful picture- The adjustable stand being part of it is a great add on. I don't have any additional clutter on my desk.- I tried to take a picture to show just how thin this monitor is & it didn't do it justice. This thing is super thin.- The viewing angles are surprisingly good!CONS:- Since I have been walking on my treadmill a lot & it's winter time out there, every time I go up to touch my mouse, if I bump the cord on this, static electricity reboots this screen & then it takes a few seconds to come back- It is a bit over-priced, but in my opinion, worth itIf you're like me & dream of the future desks that have a status monitor built into them for quick viewing, this is the add-on to get!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great second monitor for my Surface Pro 8
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a portable second monitor for use with my Surface Pro 8. This unit is great. The Surface can power and send signal to the device using one of the USB-C ports. It took a few minutes to set the resolution to very closely match the Surface. One thing is that I cannot get the monitor as bright as my Surface. Not that big a deal, but my only complaint. I would recommend this monitor. I may purchase a second so that I can have 3 monitors while traveling (which I do a lot).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Worked well at first
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two of these instead of traditional monitors as I travel and do training all over the country and this would make it easy to have all my monitors with me. At first they worked well but then they started flashing in and out like the was a short. Now they only periodically come one. I would have rated them a 1 but when they do work they are nice. I would suggest a different company/model screen for your needs.
